name: keywords
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ai_writer.
Tool description: Antherica A.I. Writer Is a set of powerful APIs to provide a comprehensive suite of tools for content creation, translation, text revision, newsletter writing, keyword and hashtag searching, and QR code generation. With the assistance of AI algorithms, users can streamline their content-related tasks and achieve professional-level results efficiently. 
API description: Fetches keywords from a given text using the AI Writer API.

content_type.description: The content type of the text (e.g. 'application/json').

text.description: The text from which to extract keywords.
